title: 有馬記念の後に・勝利の後の腹ごなし

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Haaah, I'm starving~.
G1 races really make you hungry, huh.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Dammit~, I lost~!
One salt ramen, please!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, I'll have soy sauce ramen!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Sigh, I thought I could do it today~.

text_block_list.name: Announcer A
text_block_list.text:
'The Arima Kinen held today at Nakayama Racecourse.
Among the Umamusume who ran, which one caught your attention?'

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
'Matikanetannhauser and Tokai Teio were amazing, but personally,
Nice Nature was really great!'

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
'You could feel her determination from the paddock,
and she ran a fantastic race!'

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
'She missed first place, but...
I'm looking forward to her future performances even more!'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Mhmm. That's what they said!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...
Well, I think I gave it my all!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yeah yeah, Nature was amazing.
My back was tingling.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Says the one who won.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ahaha!

Nice Nature stared at the ceiling for a while—
then lightly slapped her cheeks as if to psych herself up.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Alright, next! Next time!
Next time, I'll definitely get first!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, nice. That's positive.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Who do you think I'm copying?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ah, the ramen's here! Is it soy sauce?
I'll dig in first!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Munch...
Mmm, delicious—huh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Ah, sorry.
This might be the salt ramen.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hey!
